Class HomeApplianceDAO

java.lang.Object
homeappliance.HomeApplianceDAO
public class HomeApplianceDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing HomeAppliance records in an SQLite database. Provides methods to perform various CRUD operations, search and sort functionality which is utilised by both console and web interface.
Version:
5/1/2025
Author:
Amrit Singh

  • Constructor Details

    • HomeApplianceDAO

      public HomeApplianceDAO()
      Default constructor for HomeApplianceDAO. Initialises a new instance of the class without any additional setup.

  • Method Details

    • findAllProducts

      public ArrayList<HomeAppliance> findAllProducts()
      Retrieves all appliance products from the database and returns them as a list of HomeAppliance objects. This can be viewed either on the console or via the products page (table) on the web interface.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of HomeAppliance objects

    • findProduct

      public HomeAppliance findProduct(int id)
      Finds a single product by its specific (and unique) ID and returns it as a HomeAppliance object.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the product to find
      Returns:
      a HomeAppliance object if found, otherwise null

    • deleteProduct

      public boolean deleteProduct(int id)
      Deletes a product from the database by its specific (and unique) ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the product to delete
      Returns:
      true if the product was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • updateProduct

      public boolean updateProduct(HomeAppliance appliance)
      Updates the details of an existing product in the database which updates all the attributes of the product (except the ID).
      Parameters:
      appliance - the HomeAppliance object containing the updated details
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • addProduct

      public boolean addProduct(HomeAppliance appliance)
      Creates a new home appliance entry to the database record (in the appliance table).
      Parameters:
      appliance - the HomeAppliance object to add
      Returns:
      true if the product was successfully added, false otherwise

    • searchProductsByAttribute

      public ArrayList<HomeAppliance> searchProductsByAttribute(String attribute, String value)
      Searches for products by a specified attribute and value using a LIKE SQL condition.
      Parameters:
      attribute - - the attribute to search by
      value - - the value to search for
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of HomeAppliance objects that match the search criteria

    • productsSortedByPrice

      public ArrayList<HomeAppliance> productsSortedByPrice(boolean ascending)
      Retrieves products sorted by price in either ascending or descending order. This method can be utilised via the console or on the products page of the web interface (with a drop down menu).
      Parameters:
      ascending - true to sort by ascending price, false for descending
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of HomeAppliance objects sorted by price

    • filterProductsByAttribute

      public ArrayList<HomeAppliance> filterProductsByAttribute(String attribute, String value)
      Filters products by a specified attribute and exact value that can be accessed through the products page via a drop down menu.
      Parameters:
      attribute - - the attribute to filter by
      value - - the exact value to match
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of HomeAppliance objects that meet the filter criteria

    • filterProductsByCategory

      public ArrayList<HomeAppliance> filterProductsByCategory(String category)
      Filters products by category.
      Parameters:
      category - - the category to filter by
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of HomeAppliance objects that belong to the specified category

    • findAllCategories

      public List<String> findAllCategories()
      Finds all distinct categories that are currently stored in the database.
      Returns:
      a List of category names

    • searchProductsByKeyword

      public ArrayList<HomeAppliance> searchProductsByKeyword(String keyword)
      Searches for products using a keyword that may appear in the sku, description, or category. This method can be utilised via the search bar which is implemented within web interface.
      Parameters:
      keyword - - the keyword to search for
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of HomeAppliance objects where the keyword appears in the sku, description, or category
